department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase of National Master Standing Offers for marine fuels to be delivered across Canada.
description: Purchase of National Master Standing Offers for marine fuels to be delivered across Canada.
full_summary:
**Marine Fuel Standing Offer (2023-2025)**
================allocator contracs

# **Tender Summary**
The Government of Canada's Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for marine fuel, as described below.

## **Tender Details**
- **Reference Number**: WS3915620080-Doc4169300937
- **Solicitation Number**: WS3915620080
- **Publication Date**: August 29, 2023
- **Closes**: September 13, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 1, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31, 2025

## **Notice Type and Procurement Method**
This is a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO), Competitive - Open bidding.

## **Selection Criteria**
The selection will be based on the Lowest Price.

## **Notice of Amendment**
Please note that the closing time for bid submission has been amended to September 13, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT.

## **Key Requirements**
- **Scope of Work**: National Master Standing Offer for marine fuels meeting Canadian General Standards Board standards (Appendix "A")
- **Delivery**: Delivery to various locations across Canada as required
- **Duration**: Period of standing offer up to May 31, 2025

## **Trade Agreements**
This solicitation is open under various collectively bargained Trade Agreements, listed below:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

## **Contact Information**
To obtain more information and submit a bid, please contact Erin O'Neill at (SPAC/PSPC), [erin.oneill@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:erin.oneill@tp
